page.title: 06MEDICAL FACILITIES, BOURNE
page.content: The{Health Centre}is just off North Road. There is always a doctor on call. There are six doctors. There is a nurse in the treatment room and there is a{dentist}at the clinic. There are another two dentists in the centre of the town, one at the end of West Street and the other on South Road. There are two{opticians}in Bourne. In the{Health Centre}on Tuesdays a baby class is held. The school nurse visits the schools regularly and is a link between the family, school and Health Centre. There are two{hospitals}in Bourne, the Chest Hospital (a small cottage hospital) and St.Pter's for the mentally handicapped.
